article:
Dear Claire,
You ask me about my favorite festival. It is Spring   Festival. It is _ January or February. For the festival, we do many things and buy many things, so we are always _ . The _ of Spring Festival is _ . We wear   new red _ and put up   red paper-cuts  . And we put   lucky money   in red packets  . Boys and girls are always happy those days, _ they can have a good time with _ family, and they can get lucky money from their parents, grandparents, uncles and aunts. What do we _ on Spring Festival? Jiaozi and some fruits. In the evening, the family will watch TV together, but children  don't like watching TV for 4 hours. It's really boring for them. They always play _ their friends.
What about you? What festival do you like best?
Your friend,
Li Ju
